objects.text:
• One-Touch Operation
• Automatic Keep-Warm Function
• Perfect for Soups & Stews
• Easy-Clean Nonstick Inner Pot

Turn kitchen time into your time
with simple, effortless cooking

product_details.description: "Enjoy easy home cooking with the AROMA 6-Cup (Cooked) Pot-Style Rice Cooker. Restaurant-quality rice. Healthy meals. Delicious one-pot dishes. Prepare all this and more at the flip of a switch! Aroma takes the cook out of home cooking - turning kitchen time into your time! Help the kids with homework, get creative at play time or pick up that novel you've been waiting to dive into. All while delivering hot, hearty and healthy meals the entire family will love.This convenient cooker's compact capacity perfectly cooks 2 to 6 cups of any variety of rice. Once the rice has finished, it will automatically switch to Keep-Warm so there's no need for monitoring or stirring. It's also perfect for oatmeal, chili, jambalaya, soups and so much more! And when the cooking is done, the inner cooking pot and all accessories remove for easy cleanup in the dishwasher." Perfectly prepares 2 to 6 cups of any variety of cooked rice Simple, one-touch operation with automatic Keep-Warm Great for soups, jambalaya, chili and so much more! Full-view tempered glass lid Easy-to-clean, nonstick removable inner pot Includes Rice Measuring Cup and Serving Spatula Brand - AROMA ** Capacity - 6 Cups ** Product Dimensions - 8.13"D x 8.9"W x 8"H ** Power Source - Corded Electric ** Product Care Instructions - Hand Wash **

banner_details:
The banner features a modern and clean promotional layout for a kitchen appliance. It prominently showcases a product image (`product_image`) at the center-right, with layered textual content strategically arranged to the left. The design opens with a bold headline (`heading_1`) using uppercase typography for emphasis, followed by an eye-catching subheadline in vibrant orange (`heading_2`). Below that, a concise product name is displayed (`subheading`), supported by a four-point feature list (`description`). Pricing is highlighted in large, bold orange text (`price`) alongside a bright call-to-action button containing `cta_background` and `cta` text. A final reassurance message appears as a stylish tagline (`tagline`) under the main content. Wavy SVG lines and a soft gradient background add visual warmth without detracting from readability.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Gradient Background: `#F8F8F8` to `#E5E5E5`
- Primary Accent: `#FF5722` (Orange)
- Secondary Accent: `#FF9800` (Light Orange)
- Text Dark: `#333333`, `#444444`, `#666666`
- CTA Text: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a minimalist design with a clean and modern aesthetic. Dominated by a crisp White body (#FFFFFF), the rice cooker evokes simplicity and cleanliness. The matte Black lid and branding (#2C2C2C) create a strong contrast that anchors the design and adds a professional touch. The control panel uses bold accent colors—Amber Yellow (#F5A623) for "WARM" and Deep Red (#D0021B) for "COOK"—drawing focus and helping users visually distinguish functions. A subtle Grey (#C7C7C7) outlines the switch, blending into the white while still being identifiable. These colors together provide a balanced, eye-catching palette ideal for a sleek advertisement banner.
